name: SIMULCHEST DESTROYER Clicker Chest Simulator
description:
Click on the chest and get the treasure! Buy upgrades in the magic shop, unlock new chests, level up, and a bow that shoots at the chest. The gold mine will help you discover new opportunities in the game by mining coins for you.

The game is in a unique genre that resembles a case opening simulator.

Endless development of game indicators
20 levels of leveling
4 types of chests (wooden chest, iron chest, gold chest and diamond chest)
Random treasures in each chest
A bow that shoots at the chest automatically, helping to remove its health.
Improvements and new features with each new level.
Gold mine itself, the mining of the coin.
A jar of honey that increases your damage by 8 seconds.
Keys that automatically open chests.
